# Adjust page buttons and mail links (2025-12-11 03:20Z)

_**User (2025-12-09 10:50Z)**_

There are also two buttons at the top of the page: Get Started, and one with no text on it. Get rid of the one with no text and just leave the Get Started button, and make it also into a mail to Bosko at directorforgood.org.
